# Preface

This is an online version of the supplementary material provided by Klein et al. (2018).
We intend to update this document on (at least) an annual basis as standards and resources evolve.
We also refer interested readers to the accompanying [Example OSF project](https://osf.io/rpydu/), [additional supplementary materials](https://osf.io/h7g5t/)).
